title: [The Slope, Forest Trail]
description: The path is level here, allowing a small breather.  The quiet of the forest pervades the area, with only buzzing from insects and the occasional hooting of an owl from the distance.  A flowering bush leans against the closest tree trunk, its dusky perfume filling the air.

The path is level here, allowing a small breather.  The quiet of the forest pervades the area, with only buzzing from insects and the occasional call of a bird from the distance.  A flowering bush leans against the closest tree trunk, its dusky perfume filling the air.
